from p_user
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select: select concat(*) from p_user where user_name like concat(concat('%',#{condition}),'%') or dept_id in (select dept_id from p_dept where dept_name like concat(concat('%',#{condition}),'%') )
select * from p_user where user_name like concat(concat('%',#{condition}),'%') or dept_id in (select dept_id from p_dept where dept_name like concat(concat('%',#{condition}),'%') )
